description: Evaluates available animals against adopter profile to calculate multi-dimensional compatibility scores and generate ranked match recommendations

matches.match_explanation: Max is an ideal fit for an adopter seeking a calm, affectionate cat in an apartment setting. The adopter's cat experience and high availability align perfectly with Max’s low-maintenance needs and temperament, ensuring both comfort and companionship.
recommended_next_steps: Arrange a meet and greet with Max
Review Max’s medical records and transition plan

result.matching_summary: Of the three animals evaluated, Max the tabby cat stands out as the strongest match, closely matching the adopter’s preferences, experience, and living environment. Bella the Labrador and Luna the mixed breed are less suitable due to their energy levels, space needs, and species preference, so they were not included as primary recommendations. Max offers the best fit for sustainable adoption and mutual happiness.
